title: Complex waves: propagation evanescence and stability (TEFC)
brief_description: James Mecher at Massachusetts Institute of Technology uses springs to demonstrate the waves equation and then develops this concept to show how it relates to the study of electromagnetic fields and forces as they interact with moving and deformable media.
